nodes.text: Aldorus VI was a green gas giant in the Aldorus system.

From space, the gas giant Aldorus VI seemed to have a greenish tint. Several small asteroids could be seen drifting close to the boundary limit of the planet's atmosphere. As it had no landmasses or water, Aldorus VI couldn't sustain life, and was thus uninhabited.
The planet Aldorus VI has only appeared in the French RPG magazine Casus Belli 44.
